Html:
I tried understanding other topics here regarding the removal of the back button but I think I'm missing something. I downloaded the source code and it is in my drive C, while my project is in drive D, I located the ModernWindow.xaml and found these set of mark ups(which I believe, the back button:
<controls:ModernButton Margin="8,10,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top"                                                               EllipseDiameter="24" IconWidth="12" IconHeight="12" IconData="F1 M 33,22L 33,26L 19.75,26L 27,33L 20.5,33L 11,24L 20.5,15L 27,15L 19.75,22L 33,22 Z" Command="NavigationCommands.BrowseBack" CommandTarget="{Binding ElementName=ContentFrame}" ToolTip="{x:Static modernui:Resources.Back}" WindowChrome.IsHitTestVisibleInChrome="True" Visibility="Collapse"/>
and set the visibility to collapse but I don't know how to apply it to the project in drive D
